description: Dashboard with details of the container metrics and host OS metrics.

targets.expr: node_load1/ count by(job, instance)(count by(job, instance, cpu)(node_cpu_seconds_total))
node_load1{instance=~"$node"} / count by(job, instance)(count by(job, instance, cpu)(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$node"}))

title: Docker and OS metrics
